quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: The ones that love us never really leave us.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: We are only as strong as we are united, as weak as we are divided.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Love is the strongest force in the universe, and it protects us, and it makes us stronger than we could ever be on our own.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: It is impossible to manufacture or imitate love.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other.
speaker: J.K. Rowling
story: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quote: Hogwarts is my home.
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quote: Just because you have the emotional range of a teaspoon doesn't mean we all have.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: It is a curious thing, Harry, but perhaps those who are best suited to power are those who have never sought it.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: The best of us sometimes eat our own words.
speaker: Remus Lupin
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Dark times lie ahead of us and there will be a time when we must choose between what is easy and what is right.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: The truth is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: I solemnly swear I am up to no good.
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: We could all have been killed - or worse, expelled.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: If I were You-Know-who, I'd want you to feel cut off from everyone else. Because if it's just you alone you're not as much of a threat.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: I never knew your mother, but from what I heard she was a remarkable woman. And from what I can tell, you're very like her.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: I was the one who suggested You-Know-who should create a secret keeper. It was the best way to protect the secret, as only one person would know the true place to find you.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: That's very true. Of course, I don't expect you to understand. You're too young. But you will. Someday. You'll understand that love is the most powerful thing in the universe.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Don't you two ever listen to anything? What if I hadn't been able to get rid of that? You could have been killed, or worse, expelled.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: You're the one who's always telling us to think for ourselves, and now you're telling us to do exactly the opposite.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Differences of habit and language are nothing at all if our aims are identical and our hearts are open.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why.
speaker: Ollivander
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and above all, those who live without love.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: You are the true master of death, because the true master does not seek to run away from Death. He accepts that he must die, and understands that there are far, far worse things in the living world than dying.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Not my daughter, you bitch!
speaker: Molly Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

quote: You think the dead we loved ever truly leave us? You think that we don't recall them more clearly than ever in times of great trouble? Your father is alive in you, Harry, and shows himself plainly when you have need of him.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Indeed, your failure to understand that there are things much worse than death has always been your greatest weakness.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: I say there are spots that don't come off… Spots that never come off Snape, d'you know what I mean.
speaker: Mad-Eye Moody
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Nothing like a night time stroll to give you ideas
speaker: Mad-Eye Moody
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Curiosity is not a sin… But we should exercise caution with our curiosity… yes, indeed.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: In dreams, we enter a world that's entirely our own.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: We must try not to sink beneath our anguish, Harry, but battle on.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: It is the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Ah, music. A magic beyond all we do here!
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: People find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Age is foolish and forgetful when it underestimates youth.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: When you have seen as much of life as I have, you will not underestimate the power of obsessive love.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: You sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
speaker: Ginny Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain.
speaker: Arthur Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: As much money and life as you could want! The two things most human beings would choose above all – the trouble is, humans do have a knack of choosing precisely those things that are worst for them.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: There is no good or evil: only power and those too weak to seek it.
speaker: Quirinus Quirrell
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: The mind is not a book, to be opened at will and examined at leisure. Thoughts are not etched on the inside of skulls, to be perused by an invader. The mind is a complex and many-layered thing.
speaker: Severus Snape
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Youth cannot know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: He chose the boy he thought most likely to be a danger to him … and notice this, Harry. He chose, not the pureblood (which according to his creed, is the only kind of wizard worth being or knowing), but the half-blood, like himself. He saw himself in you before he had ever seen you, and in marking you with that scar, he did not kill you, as he intended, but gave you powers, and a future, which have fitted you to escape him not once, but four times so far.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: Time is making fools of us again.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Funny way to get to a wizards' school, the train. Magic carpets all got punctures, have they?
speaker: Uncle Vernon
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Troll - in the dungeons - thought you ought to know.
speaker: Professor Quirrell
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Training for the ballet, Potter?
speaker: Draco Malfoy
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Of all the trees we could've hit, we had to get one that hits back.
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: You will also find that help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Honestly, if you were any slower, you'd be going backward.
speaker: Draco Malfoy
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Dobby has never been asked to sit down by a wizard - like an equal.
speaker: Dobby
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: I'll be in my bedroom, making no noise and pretending I'm not there.
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Don't let the muggles get you down.
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Mr. Moony presents his compliments to Professor Snape, and begs him to keep his abnormally large nose out of other people's business.
speaker: Mr.Moony/The Marauder's Map
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
speaker: George Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Fawkes is a phoenix, Harry. Phoenixes burst into flame when it is time for them to die and are reborn from the ashes.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Are you insane? Of course I want to leave the Dursleys! Have you got a house? When can I move in?
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Mischief Managed!
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Why, dear boy, we don't send wizards to Azkaban just for blowing up their aunts.
speaker: Cornelius Fudge
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Your devotion is nothing more than cowardice. You would not be here if you had anywhere else to go.
speaker: Voldemort
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Just because it's taken you three years to notice, Ron, doesn't mean no one else has spotted I'm a girl!
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Anyone can speak Troll. All you have to do is point and grunt.
speaker: Fred Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Twitchy little ferret, aren't you, Malfoy?
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Wit beyond measure is man's greatest treasure.
speaker: Luna Lovegood
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Don't worry. You're just as sane as I am.
speaker: Luna Lovegood
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Yeah, Quirrell was a great teacher. There was just that minor drawback of him having Lord Voldemort sticking out of the back of his head!
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Youth can not know how age thinks and feels. But old men are guilty if they forget what it was to be young.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: You should write a book, translating mad things girls do so boys can understand them.
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Ron - you are the most insensitive wart I have ever had the misfortune to meet.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Once again, you show all the sensitivity of a blunt axe.
speaker: Nearly Headless Nick
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Dumbledore says people find it far easier to forgive others for being wrong than being right.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quote: You need your friends, Harry.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: He can run faster than Severus Snape confronted with shampoo.
speaker: Fred Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: I always said he was mental. Brilliant and everything, but cracked.
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Always.
speaker: Severus Snape
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Ron, you know full well Harry and I were brought up by Muggles!
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: The consequences of our actions are always so complicated, so diverse, that predicting the future is a very difficult business indeed.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

quote: Snape's patronus was a doe, the same as my mother's because he loved her for nearly all of his life, from when they were children.
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Do not pity the dead, Harry. Pity the living, and, above all those who live without love.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Albus Severus, you were named for two headmasters of Hogwarts. One of them was a Slytherin and he was probably the bravest man I ever knew.
speaker: Harry Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Until the very end
speaker: James Potter
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Books! And cleverness! There are more important things - friendship and bravery.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: We're with you whatever happens.
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: No good sittin' worryin' abou' it. What's comin' will come, an' we'll meet it when it does.
speaker: Rubeus Hagrid
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving.
speaker: Kingsley Shacklebolt
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: There's things more importan' than keepin' a job.
speaker: Rubeus Hagrid
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Sadly, accidental rudeness occurs alarmingly often. Best to say nothing at all, my dear man.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: We've been hearing explosions out of their room for ages, but we never thought they were actually making things. We thought they just liked the noise.
speaker: Ginny Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: You know, Minister, I disagree with Dumbledore on many counts... but you cannot deny he's got style...
speaker: Phineas Nigellus
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: Dobby is free
speaker: Dobby
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Accio Brain!
speaker: Ron Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: I think we've outgrown full-time education... Time to test our talents in the real world, d'you reckon?
speaker: Fred Weasley
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: I mean, it's sort of exciting, isn't it, breaking the rules?
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
speaker: Sirius Black
story: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

quote: It is the quality of one's convictions that determines success, not the number of followers.
speaker: Remus Lupin
story: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

quote: To have been loved so deeply, even though the person who loved us is gone, will give us some protection forever.
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: Alas! Ear wax!
speaker: Albus Dumbledore
story: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

quote: Amazing! Amazing! This is just like magic!
speaker: Gilderoy Lockhart
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: We're coming with you. That was decided months ago - years, really.
speaker: Hermione Granger
story: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows

quote: You shall not harm Harry Potter!
speaker: Dobby
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quote: Such a beautiful place this is, to be with friends, Dobby feels joy for being with his friends, Harry Potter.
speaker: Dobby
story: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
